Kartia Researcher:
You are a hero who wants to protect these lands from The goddess of Destruction and evil creatures? Then You will definitely be able to help us.
Demons from the Spatial Rift intend to invade our Aden. Me sent here as part of an expedition the study of Kartii of the Kingdom of Aden. We are looking for daredevil, which will help to attack the demons Maze Of Cartii.
